member.name: P:Agony.AssetManagement.Tools.AGAtlas.CanInteract
member.summary: Determines if API calls can be made. All API calls must be done before game starts loading resources.

member.name: M:Agony.AssetManagement.Tools.AGAtlas.SetSprite(System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.Sprite)
member.summary: Replaces atlas sprite. If sprite is not found, then new sprite will be added. If atlas is not found, then action will be omitted. Atlas name is case sensitive.

member.name: M:Agony.AssetManagement.Tools.AGAtlas.SaveAtlases(System.String)
member.summary: Forces game to export atlases once they will be used. Patched sprites will be also exported. Due to the gamma-linear conversion sprite colors might be impacted.
